item.title: Setting teleports in mage book...how?
item.dc:creator: @djvawter djvawter
item.description:
@djvawter wrote:

r34p4g3pk:

In this community you’ll find members with low java knowledge and you’ll find members who know an extreme amount about it. He is obviously new and doesn’t know what class to look for it in. A hint like you gave him can lead him to several different class files, i told him the class, now he knows the class to look for it in, end of story.

thats very nice of you. thank you alot dude!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 22, 2009, 04:10:39 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Chris4099, post:11, topic:321094”]What source are you using[/quote]
scaperune[quote=“xxlukexx, post:12, topic:321094”][quote author=djvawter link=topic=417552.msg3070243#msg3070243 date=1261497723]

Stop posting nonsense and actually help him. To change those teleports you would go into the clicking class. (Clicking or clickingbuttons.java)

I didn’t post non-sense, I gave him a hint, which should have lead him in the right direction…

People here cannot even do the most simplest edits to a server, period.

It’s sad really, it makes me disheartened to watch this actually happen.

hey douche bag, not everyone is as perfect. everyone has to start somewhere and can not just learn everything in 5 minutes. gtfo this planet. you are an ass hole. mabye…im new to this…hmmm…yea that sounds right. go build me a car, i expect it in 1 week from now. i mean, you should already know EVERYTHING about it, right?
[/quote]

djva, just ignore, i personally thought what he said was utterly stupid as that isn’t a hint.[/quote]
agreed, thank you

item.title: Setting teleports in mage book...how?
item.dc:creator: @Chris4099 Chris4099
item.description:
@Chris4099 wrote:

Ok if ure using a 508 server go to (Your server name)(Server Type)\player\Magic.java

Onece ure there press control+f and search for

  public boolean modernMagicAB(Player p, int buttonID) {

Under there search for the coords u wnt to change example

case 18: // Lumbridge Teleport if (p.magicDelay <= 0) { if (magicLvl(p) >= modernLvlReq[buttonID]) { if (hasReq(p, air, 3) && hasReq(p, law, 1) && hasReq(p, earth, 1)) { teleTo(p, 3222, 3217);//<----------------THAT THE COORDS U TELEPORT WHEN U CLICK ON IT deleteItems(p, air, 3, law, 1, earth, 1); magicXp(p, modernSpellXp[buttonID]); } else { sendMsg(p, "You dont have the required runes to cast this spell."); p.magicDelay = mainDelayInt; } } else { sendMsg(p, "You need level " + modernLvlReq[buttonID] + " magic to use this spell."); p.magicDelay = mainDelayInt; } } else { sendMsg(p, "You need to wait before casting a spell again."); p.clickDelay = mainClickDelay; } break;

Save and compile Hope it helps
